column4: are there any linux certs i can work on, that you ppl could sugest?

LPI is supposed to be distro-agnostic
you want libgtk1.2-dev
what are you building?
the software is called "corewars"
ah, old school
what multimedia programs aren't in Ubuntu?
what happened when you tried to get them from universe?
yes, what isn't packaged that you want?
which *exact* pieces of software
on a side note, i'd like to see silc a part of ubuntu's lists
silc the irc-ish protocol?
yes silc; the irc-ish protocol
irssi supports it already
an irc client that also does silc
yes
so what more do you want?
of all the software on that page, only xo wave and jack beat are not in ubuntu
please file a bug
if it's Free, file a RFP bug on Debian (assuming no one else has)
no need to /msg me
